content:
{{knowledge objective

|Item_parent=Prolonged fever
|Item_parent_short=Prolonged fever
|Rank=A
|Title=Know the three main categories of causes of prolonged fever
|Description=Infectious/Neoplastic/Non-infectious inflammatory
|Rubric=Etiologies
|Contributors=
|Order=2}}


* infectious causes
* neoplastic causes
* Non-infectious inflammatory causes.

question.title: What are the three main categories of causes of prolonged fever?

option_a.title: Infectious and Neoplastic
option_a.description: Two categories of causes of prolonged fever

option_b.title: Infectious and Non-infectious inflammatory
option_b.description: Two categories of causes of prolonged fever

option_c.title: Neoplastic and Non-infectious inflammatory
option_c.description: Two categories of causes of prolonged fever

option_d.title: All of the above
option_d.description: All three categories of causes of prolonged fever

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: The correct letter of the answer
